name: The vault of the Holy Spirit

contents.contents: Turn your back to the Jouy door. Walk straight down the street and you will come to the Caveau de Saint-Esprit on your left.
A large, vaulted room is all that remains of a former hospital. Today, it is used for private events and cannot be visited.

question.contents: Who could come to be taken care of in that hospital?

explanations.contents: That hospital welcomed poor and old people as well as children.
